rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of administrative levels. These are the varying levels of administration for different government and other organization. For example, a court can be a federal or state level of administration. A location can have national or state level of significance.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Administrative Level

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description:
Any agency operated by a government, a government unit responsible for administering specific functions for a government.
Things that are a government agency:
## Government agencies established by a national government (e.g. Swedish Medical Products Agency, French Agency for Employment, Jobcentre Plus).
## Government agencies established by a state or local government (e.g. Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives, Department of Natural Resources and Water).
## Government departments (e.g. United States Department of Energy, South African Department of Health, Philippines Department of Agriculture, Columbia Administrative Department of Security).
## Government ministries (e.g. New Zealand Ministry of Education, Chinese Ministry of Public Security, Egyptian Ministry of Education).
## Government agencies that are also parent or sub-agencies (e.g. The United States Department of Homeland Security is a parent agency of FEMA, and the Federal Aviation Administration is a sub agency of the United States Department of Transportation).
Things that are NOT a government agency:
## Bodies that constitute a government such as legislatures and courts (e.g. Riksdag, Landtag of Liechtenstein, Chamber of Deputies of Tunisia, Texas Supreme Court, U.S. District Court for the District of Massachusetts). Use mso:government.governmental_body for these cases.
## Government legislative committees and subcommittees (e.g. United States House Committee on the Judiciary, Comision de Salud, Committee on Legal Affairs). Use mso:government.legislative_committee for these cases.
## Associations and organizations (e.g. American Library Association, United Nations Children???s Fund, National Association of Latino Organizations). Use mso:organization.organization for these.
## Military forces of a nation (e.g. Turkish Armed Forces, Vietnam People???s Army, Australian Defence Force). Use mso:military.armed_force for these.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Government Agency

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The date when this agency was founded.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Date founded

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:government.agency to the mso:government.government of which it is a part.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Government

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.agency to the mso:government.governmental_jurisdiction over which the agency has jurisdiction. For example, if the agency is for the national government, enter the country; if it is part of a local government, enter the city or municipality.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Jurisdiction of agency's government

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.agency to its predecessor mso:government.agency. This includes if agency was formerly known as another agency, or if this agency took on the functions of a previous agency. Mergers and spin-offs should be entered in the appropriate properties of mso:organization.organization.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Predecessor Agency

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:government.agency to its successor mso:government.agency.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Successor Agency

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type that aggregates information about the number of members of a particular political party who voted a certain way on a given issue.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Aggregated Vote

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the number of votes of the given type cast by the given political party.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number of Votes

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the political party whose members voted in the given way.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Political Party

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the type of vote cast by the given number of members of the specified political party.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Vote

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies a unique identifier for the vote cast.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Vote Identifier

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all appointed government roles. These are the offices that are filled by an official bestowing the office on another person.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Appointed Role

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type that stores information about the appointment of a particular person to a government position.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Appointment

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the person or organization that appointed the given person to the position.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Appointed by

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A role, job or title to which a person can be appointed
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Appointed Role

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the person appointed to the given position.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Appointee

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all appointment nominations. These are the events in which one person is nominated for a government appointed position by another.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Appointment Nomination

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.appointment_nomination to its mso:government.appointed_role for the nomination.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Position

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all current and former Australian Members of Parliament.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Australian Member of Parliament
House ID
rdf:Description.mso:type.property.deprecation_info: No instances, and no definition on wikipedia MPs. DeprecatedBy:[REDMOND\ianiles] Successor:[mso:type.object.key]

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Senate ID
rdf:Description.mso:type.property.deprecation_info: No instances and no definition on wikipedia MPs. DeprecatedBy:[REDMOND\ianiles] Successor:[mso:type.object.key]

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all former and current members of the Canadian Parliament.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Canadian Member of Parliament
House ID
rdf:Description.mso:type.property.deprecation_info: No instances and no definition on wikipedia MPs. DeprecatedBy:[REDMOND\ianiles] Successor:[mso:type.object.key]

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Senate ID
rdf:Description.mso:type.property.deprecation_info: No instances and no definition on wikipedia MPs. DeprecatedBy:[REDMOND\ianiles] Successor:[mso:type.object.key]

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A decree is a law that is enacted by a head of state, e.g. a president or monarch.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Decree

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description:
An election contest is an opportunity for constituents to vote for a political party or candidate for a governmental office or seat, or the ability to run for a governmental office or seat (as is the case with primaries).
Things that are election contests:
## Local elections (e.g. London Mayoral Election 2004, Singapore City Council by-election 1958).
## National elections (e.g. Chilean Presidential Election, Dominican Republic Presidential Election 2004, Israel Prime Ministerial Election 2001).
## Election of representatives (e.g. California's 19th State Senate district election, 2008, 2002 Republican Primary, Georgia's 7th Congressional District, Adelaide by election 1988).
## Primaries (e.g. Massachusetts Democratic Primary 2008).
## Elections in which the candidates are chosen by electors who represent the public (e.g. Hong Kong Chief Executive Election 1997, United States Presidential Election 2004).
## Uncontested elections (e.g. California's 18th congressional district election, 2008).
## Multiple-winner contests (e.g. Israel legislative election, 2006).
## A collection of senate or parliament elections (e.g. United States Elections 2006, Sri Lankan Parliamentary Election 1989, Icelandic Parliamentary Election 1980).
## A general election (e.g. Alabama State Elections 2008, United States General Elections 2008, Indian General Election in Andhra Pradesh 1980).
Things that are NOT election contests:
## A campaign (e.g. Stephen Colbert Presidential Campaign 2008, John Quincy Adams Presidential Campaign 1828, Simba Makoni Zimbabwe Presidential Campaign 2008). Use mso:government.election_campaign in these cases.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Election

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:government.election to the mso:government.election_campaign the candidates ran for the given election.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Campaign

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property relating an mso:government.election to the mso:government.election_results that collect data about the results for this election. This includes the candidate, popular vote results, and percentage.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Results

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.election to the year when the election was/will be held.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Date of Election

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.election to the mso:government.general_election of which it is a part.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: General Election

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.election to the webpages of polls for the election.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Poll Webpages

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.election to the mso:government.office_or_title the election is intended to fill. Be as specific as possible: e.g. Prime Minister of Canada, Mayor of San Francisco, United States Senator, etc.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Office

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.election to its mso:government.political_district, which is the location where the constituents for the election live.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: District

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links an election to a polling place where voters can cast a ballot in the election.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Polling Place

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.election to the mso:government.politician that was elected to office in the given election.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Winner

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all election campaigns. These are the events in which a candidate runs for a political office. He or she may run as a single entity or run with another person to form a ticket, like in US presidential elections. The candidate has an organized effort to persuade voters to cast their vote in his or her or their favor, which is the campaign.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Election campaign

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an election campaign to the organization that manages the campaign.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Campaign Organization

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.election_campaign to the mso:government.politician that is a candidate in the election.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Candidate

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.election_campaign to the election in which the politician ran the campaign.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Election

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: If the campaign has an official website, enter it here.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Official website
rdf:Description.mso:type.property.deprecation_info: Use type.object.webpage with webpage.label.official. DeprecatedBy:[REDMOND\jcoop] Successor:[mso:type.object.webpage]

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.election_campaign to the candidate's political party.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Party

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.election_campaign to the total amount of money raised by the candidate by the given date.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Total Amount Raised

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all election polls. These are the surveys of public opinion on the candidates or issues for a given election.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Election Poll

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.election_poll to its mso:government.election_with_poll.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Election

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.election_poll with the location the poll covers.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Location

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.election_poll to the margin of error for the results of this poll.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Margin of error

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.election_poll to the number of people who responded to the poll.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number Polled

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.election_poll to the date that this poll's results were released.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Release Date

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.election_poll to the mso:government.election_poll_score relationship that collects the data on the poll's subjects, like candidates or political issues, and the score each one received in the poll.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Subject

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.election_poll to the organization that conducted the poll.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Taken by

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.election_poll to the category or categories of the polls respondents (such as "registered voters" or "adults").
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Category Polled

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Relationship collecting the data for how well an entity polled for a given poll.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Election Poll Score

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.election_poll_score relationship to the mso:government.election_poll the entity and score appear.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Poll

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.election_poll_score to the percent of people polled that are in favor of this entity or would vote for this entity.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Score

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.election_poll_score to the the entity (such as a candidate) that had this score in the poll.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Subject

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Relationship collecting the data on an mso:government.election's results, including the popular vote and percentage. Use the more specific mso:government.legislative_election_results when the results are for a general election and a political party's results.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Election Results

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.election_results to the candidate that received the percentage or number of votes. Use mso:government.legislative_election_results when the results are for a general election and a political party's results.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Candidate

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.election_results to the mso:government.election the results reported.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Election

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.election_results to the number of popular votes the candidate or party received.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Popular Votes

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.election_results to the percentage of votes the given party or candidate received.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Popular Vote Percentage

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that is used in cases when an issue rather than a candidate is the subject of an election. This property is used to store the position with respect to the issue, which may be "yes/no" or a selection from a list of alternatives.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Position
Election with polls
rdf:Description.mso:type.type.deprecation_info: Use mso:government.election or one of its subclasses instead, as this item will not be supported. DeprecatedBy:[REDMOND\ianiles] Successor:[mso:government.election]

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Polls taken regarding this election.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Polls
rdf:Description.mso:type.property.deprecation_info: If this property is needed, it should be added to government.election. DeprecatedBy:[REDMOND\ianiles]

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all electoral colleges. These are the groups of electors that are selected to elect a candidate to an office. An electoral college is used to elect the president and vice-president.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Electoral College

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:government.electoral_college to the mso:government.indirect_election in which the electoral college selected one of the candidates.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Elections

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.electoral_college to the mso:government.electoral_college_elected_office relationship that collects the data on an electoral college's election of a given office over a duration of time.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Offices

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Relationship collecting the data for a given electoral college used to elect people to given positions.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Electoral College Elected Office

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:government.electoral_college_elected_office to the mso:government.electoral_college that performed the election.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Electoral College

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.electoral_college_elected_office to the date of the first election in which the given electoral college participated.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: From

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.electoral_college_elected_office to the mso:government.office_or_title that the given electoral college is (or was) responsible for electing.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Office

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.electoral_college_elected_office to the date of the final election in which this electoral college participated.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: To

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A division of a national government that represents the interests of the government in a foreign country.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Embassy or Consulate

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: An administrative division of a national government.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Federal Agency

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A government organization that provides emergency firefighting and rescue services for a certain jurisdiction, typically a municipality or county. Includes fire departments and fire brigades.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Fire Protection

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all forms of governments. These are the groupings of governments by similar characteristics.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Form of Government

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: An agency that places minors who are wards of the government into institutions, group homes, or private homes, where the head of the household is referred to as a "foster parent". Note that this covers only around-the-clock care for children outside of their own homes.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Foster Care Service

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all general elections. General elections are those elections in which all or most of the members of a given political body are chosen. This term usually applies to elections for a nation's primary legislation body.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: General election

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:government.general_election to the individual mso:government.election(s) included in the general ones.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Contests

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.general_election to the number of seats up for election in this election.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Election Seats

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.general_election to the subset of mso:government.general_election(s) that are included. For example, a national general election may include state or province-level general elections. Use mso:government.general_election.contests for the individual elections that make up the individual contests in the general election.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Includes general election

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.general_election to the mso:government.legislative_election_results relationship that collects the data for general election results for a legislative body.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Legislative Results

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.general_election to the mso:government.general_election of which it is a subset. For example, the 2008 US Senate elections in Wyoming is a part of the 2008 US Senate elections.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Part Of

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.general_election to its turnout, which is the percentage of registered voters voting in this election.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Turnout

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all governments. Governments are the system of governing authority for a given political unit or community.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Government

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.government to its mso:government.agencies, those agencies that are part of the given government.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Agencies

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.government to the mso:government.governmental_jurisdiction for which the government has responsibility.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Government For

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all government agreements. These are the agreements between two or more sovereign nations with varying degrees of legal bindings.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Government Agreement

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.government_agreement to the mso:location.sovereign that is a party to the agreement
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Parties

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a government agreement to the date that agreement was officially signed by the parties to the agreement.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Date Signed

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a government agreement to the language or languages in which the agreement is or was expressed.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Language

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a government agreement to the location where the agreement was officially signed by the parties to the agreement.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Location Signed

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property linking a government agreement to a textual description of the outcome of the agreement.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Result

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Type representing the collection of all government organizations. These are the organizations related to governing a political entity. Sub-types include political parties, legislative groups, and government agencies and departments.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Government Organization

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type for collecting information about the form of government of a sovereign state and the time frame when it had the form of government.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Government Tenure

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the date when the given sovereign state abandoned the form of government.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: End Date

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the form of government, e.g. democracy, of the given sovereign state in the time frame provided.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Form of Government

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the date when the given sovereign state adopted the form of government.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Start Date

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all government bodies, which have executive or legislative authority with respect to a particular jurisdiction. It includes the entire government of a jurisdiction, like the state government of New Jersey, for example, as well as organizations tasked with a portion of governance, e.g. city councils and legislative bodies.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Governmental Body

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating a component mso:government.government_body to its larger mso:government.government_body.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Component Of

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:government.governmental_body to its mso:government.legislative_committee(s).
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Committees

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.governmental_body to its component bodies, for example a legislature that has more than one house, such as the House of Lords and House of Commons within the UK Parliament.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Component Bodies

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: If this body no longer exists, enter the date it was dissolved.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Date dissolved

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The date when this governmental body was formed.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Date formed

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:government.governmental_body to the mso:government.governmental_jurisdiction over which the body has responsibility.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Jurisdiction

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:government.governmental_body to the mso:government.position_held relationship that collects the data for member tenures for the body.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Members

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.government_body to the types of roles and titles that are associated with the body.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Offices/Positions Within the Body

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:government.governmental_body to its sessions.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Sessions

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all jurisdictions. Jurisdiction is the legal concept of the right and power to interpret and apply the law. In this collection, these are the locations within which that power can be exercised.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Governmental Jurisdiction

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:government.governmental_jurisdiction to its mso:government.agency(s).
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Agencies

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:government.governmental_jurisdiction to the mso:government.position_held relationships that collect data for the politicians holding office within the jurisdiction.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Governing Officials

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:government.governmental_jurisdiction to the mso:government.govenrment that holds the legal power and right to interpret and apply the law in the location.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Government

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.governmental_jurisdiction to the mso:government.governmental_body of this location, such as legislatures or councils. Names should be unique to this location, for example "San Francisco City Council", rather than the generic "City Council".
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Government Bodies

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.governmental_jurisdiction to its mso:government.office_or_title(s). Names should be specific to this location, like "Mayor of New York" or "Prime Minister of Canada", rather than the generic "President" or "Queen".
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Offices

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.governmental_jurisdiction to the mso:location.dated_symbol(s) officially recognized by the jurisdiction. Examples include national flowers, state birds, or provincial animals.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Official Symbols

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A government agency that provides free or below-market-rate apartments to qualified applicants.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Housing Agency

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A division of a federal government that assists individuals who are citizens of foreign countries in obtaining visas and becoming citizens and residents.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Immigration Agency

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all indirect elections. Indirect elections are those elections in which the population does not directly choose a candidate for an office, but rather they select representatives, who subsequently make the choice.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Indirect election

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.indirect_election to theT body of electors that votes in this election.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Electors

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: An enumeration type containing standard values to record the progression of a piece of legislation from its introduction to its enactment as law.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Legislation Status

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: An enumeration value indicating that the bill has been promulgated as law.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Enacted

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: An enumeration value that indicates that the bill failed to pass in the first house of a bicameral legislative system.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Failed First House

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: An enumeration value that indicates that the bill failed to pass in the second house of a bicameral legislative system.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Failed Second House

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: An enumeration value indicating that the veto of the bill was not overridden by a vote in a legislative house.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Failed to Override Veto

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: An enumeration value that indicates that the bill was introduced into a legislative house.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Introduced

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: An enumeration value indicating that the veto of the bill was overridden by a vote in a legislative house.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Overrode Veto

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: An enumeration value that indicates that the bill was passed in the first house of a bicameral legislative system.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Passed First House

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: An enumeration value that indicates that the bill was passed in the second house of a bicameral legislative system.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Passed Second House

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: An enumeration value indicating that the head of state prevented a legislative bill from being enacted by retaining the bill unsigned until it is too late.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Pocket-vetoed

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: An enumeration value indicating that the legislative houses are creating a single version of a bill that was passed in different forms by the respective houses.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Resolving Differences

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: An enumeration value indicating that the bill passed the legislative house(s) and has been forwarded to the head of state for signature.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: To Head of State

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: An enumeration value indicating that the bill was rejected by the head of state.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Vetoed

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all legislative committees. These are the committees that are part of a legislative body.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Legislative Committee

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The date, if any, on which this committee was dissolved.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Date dissolved

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The date that this committee was first formed.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Date formed

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.legislative_committee to the legislature of which this committee is a part.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Legislature

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:government.legislative_committee to the mso:government.legislative_committee_membership relationship that collects data about the committee members.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Members

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:government.legislative_committee to its broader committee.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Subcommittee Of

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.legislative_committee to its sub-committees.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Subcommittees

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Relationship collecting the data for a given politician's tenure on a committee.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Legislative Committee Membership

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.legislative_committee_membership to the date the committee membership ended.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: End Date

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.legislative_committee_membership to its mso:government.legislative_committee.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Committee

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.legislative_committee_membership to the mso:government.legislative_committee_title the politician held during this membership.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Title

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.legislative_committee_membership to the mso:government.legislative_session(s) the politician held the given role on the committee.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Session

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.legislative_committee_membership to the mso:government.politician that held the title for the given membership.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Member

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.legislative_committee_membership to the start date for the membership.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Start Date

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all legislative committee roles. These are the titles or roles that members of a committee hold and indicate the members contribution to the committee.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Legislative Committee Title

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Relationship collecting data for the results of a given political party in a legislative election. This is a summary of how well a party overall did.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Legislative Election Results

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.legislative_election_results to the mso:government.governmental_body for which the results apply.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Legislature

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.legislative_election_results to the number of seats the given party won.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number of Seats

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.legislative_election_results to the mso:government.political_party which won the given number of seats.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Party

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all legislative sessions. These are the periods of time in which a legislature is convened for the purpose of making laws.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Legislative Session

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.legislative_session to the date the session started.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Date Began

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.legislative_session to the date the session ended.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Date Ended

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.legislative_session to its mso:government.governmental_body.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Legislature

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:government.legislative_session to the mso:government.position_held relationships collecting the data for politicians holding office in the session.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Members

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A vote that is cast by a member of a legislative house of government.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Legislative Vote

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a legislative vote to the proposed legislation that was voted on.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Legislation

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that indicates the political party with which the vote is aligned.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Party

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that relates a legislative vote to the politician that cast the vote.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Politician

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that indicates the vote that was cast by the given politician with respect to the given proposed legislation.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Vote

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A division of government that provides licenses, e.g. driver's licenses and marriage licenses.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Licensing Agency

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all national anthems. These are the musical compositions that are formally adopted by a government as its anthem.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: National Anthem

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.national_anthem to the mso:government.national_anthem_of_a_country relationship collecting the data on a song and its duration as the anthem of a nation.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: National Anthem of

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Relationship collecting the data for a given musical piece's use as a national anthem for a country.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: National Anthem of a Country

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:government.national_anthem_of_a_country to the composition that was the anthem during the given time period.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Anthem

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.national_anthem_of_a_country to the mso:location.sovereign that recognized the composition as its anthem.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Country

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: An administrative division of a state or local government.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Non-federal Agency

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A general type for alerts by government agencies, whether local, regional or national. includes offical travel advisories, e.g. those issued by the US State Department, government recalls of defective products, and Amber alerts.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Government Notification

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all government office categories. These are the general groupings of government offices without the jurisdiction or other qualification, e.g. "Prime Minister" and "Senator" rather than "Prime Minister of Canada" and "U. S. Senator", which are instead instances of mso:government.office_or_title.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Government Office Category

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all government offices or titles. The instances of this type should be specific roles, e.g. "Prime Minister of Canada" and "Mayor of Queensborough" rather than "Prime Minister" or "Mayor", which are instead instances of mso:government.office_category.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Government Office

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.office_or_title to the mso:government.office_category that is the general category of this office. For example, if the office is "Mayor of Queensborough", its category would be "Mayor".
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Category

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:government.office_or_title to an associated mso:government.governmental_body.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Governmental Body

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:government.office_or_title to the associated mso:government.governmental_jurisdiction.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Jurisdiction

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:government.office_or_title to the mso:government.position_held relationship that collects data on the politician holding office with that title.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Office Holders

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all parliamentary elections. These are the general elections that occur in a parliamentary system of government.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Parliamentary Election

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.parliamentary_election to the mso:government.political_party that formed the government.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Government formed by

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.parliamentary_election to the mso:government.politician that was chosen as the head of government.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Resulting head of government

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.parliamentary_election to the mso:government.politician that was chosen as the head of state.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Resulting head of state
appointees
rdf:Description.mso:type.property.deprecation_info: If this property is needed, it should be added to government.politician. DeprecatedBy:[REDMOND\ianiles]

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all political districts. These are the locations that have been created for the purpose of electing representatives to legislative bodies.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Political District

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:government.political_district to the mso:government.election(s) that have occurred for the district.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Elections

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a political district to the number of residents in the district that are registered to vote.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Electorate

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:government.political_district to the mso:government.position_held relationships that collect data for the district's representatives.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Representatives

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type containing political, social, and economic beliefs or ideals.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Political Ideology

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:government.political_ideology to the mso:government.political_party that promotes this ideology.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Political Parties

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description:
The political party type is used for any organized political group that primarily aims for the attainment of political power and public office for its designated members. This type includes both active and inactive political parties. Note that this type has a property for "country", because there are many parties with the same or similar names operating in different countries.
Things that are political parties:
## Transnational political parties (e.g. Arab Socialist Action Party, Natural Law Party).
## National political parties (e.g. Christian Union, Italy of Values, Peoples Reform Party, Lithuanian Christian Democrats).
## Local and sub-national political parties (e.g. Tasmanian Greens, Stockholm Party).
## Political parties with military branches (e.g. Hezbollah, Hamas).
Things that are NOT Political parties:
## Groups of political parties such as multi-party coalitions (e.g. Islami Jamhoori Ittehad, United Democratic Madhesi Front, Party of European Socialists, United Progressive Alliance). Use mso:organization.organization in these cases.
## Factions within a party or sub-organizations of a political party (e.g. Labor Right, Green 2000, Cornerstone Group, Ferguson Left, New Alliance). Use mso:organization.organization for these cases.
## Youth wing of any political party (e.g. Communist Youth League, Juventud del Poder Popular). Use mso:organization.organization for these.
## Associations of political parties and political internationals (e.g. Alliance of American and European Democrats, Pirate Parties International, Socialist International). Use mso:organization.organization for these.
## Political movements and pressure groups (e.g.Six Point Movement, National Political Association "??am??ria", Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament, Women???s Electoral Lobby). Use mso:organization.organization for these.
## Legislative and executive bodies that make up a government (e.g. Council of the District of Columbia, Riksdag, Landtag of Liechtenstein). Use mso:government.governmental_body in these cases.
## Government agencies (e.g. Intelligence Bureau, INSEE, Jobcentre Plus). Use mso:government.agency in these cases.
## Individual persons who are members of political parties (e.g. Jacques Chirac, Mohan Rawale, Fausto Bertinotti). Use mso:government.politician in these cases.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Political Party

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.political_party to the mso:location.sovereign in which the party operates.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Country

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A Boolean property that specifies whether or not the political party is a major party. If the Boolean property is set to 1, then the party is a major party.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Major Party

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.political_party to its mso:government.political_party.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Ideology

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:government.political_party to the mso:government.political_party_tenure relationships that collect data on the politicians associated with the party.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Politicians

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Relationship collecting the data for a given politician's membership in a political party.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Political Party Tenure

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the date that the given politician joined the party.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: From

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.political_party_tenure to the mso:government.political_party the politician is a member of during the given time period.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Party

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.political_party_tenure relationship to the mso:government.politician that is a member of the party for the given duration.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Politician

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the date, if any, that the given politician left the party.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: To

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Relationship containing the data for a given entity's political position. This relationship includes data such as the date the position is valid for, the position, the issue with respect to which the position is held, and confidence.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Political Position

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.political_position_relationship to the agent holding the political view.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Agent

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.political_position_relationship to the source's confidence in the accuracy of the agent's position on the given issue.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Confidence

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:political_position_relationship to the mso:type.datetime for which the position is valid.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Date

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.political_position_relationship to the mso:common.text that contains the text describing the political issue, with respect to which the position is held.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Issue Description

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.political_position_relationship to the mso:common.text that contains the text describing the agent's political position.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Position

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.political_position_relationship to the type.text that is the status of the given political position. Examples of status include Official, Inferred, and Unknown
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Status

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description:
The politician type is used for any person who holds, has held, seeks or has sought an office or position which provides the individual the ability to vote* on or ratify changes to legislation as part of the governmental system of a nation-state or recognized region. This also includes kings, queens and other monarchs.
Things that are politicians:
## Members of the executive branch of government in national, regional and local levels level like presidents, vice presidents, governors, vice governors, mayors, councilors, etc. (e.g. Barack Obama, Noli de Castro, Arnold Schwarzenegger, Gavin Newsom).
## Members of the legislative branch at the national level as representatives, senators, etc. (e.g. Robert Adelholt, Joe Lieberman).
## Heads of states who presided over a nation through means other than election (appointment, heredity, coup d'etat, dictatorship), such as prime ministers, dictators, etc. (e.g. John Howard, Kim Jong-il, Phaedon Gizikis).
## Kings, queens, emirs and other monarchs with official political power (e.g. King Fahd bin Abdul Aziz Al Saud, Akihito, Elizabeth II).
## Persons appointed to a position that is normally filled by election, because the elected person had to leave office (e.g. Roland Burris, who was appointed senator of Illinois when Barack Obama became president.)
## Elected supreme court justices and other members of the judicial branch (e.g. Sue Bell Cobb, Terrence O'Donnell).
## Elected law enforcers such as sheriffs and district attorneys (e.g. Cyrus Vance Jr., Lee Baca).
## Lords and barons in a feudal system. This also includes any position in ancient or medieval times that is equivalent to one held by modern politicians.
## Candidates and nominees for any elected government positions.
Things that are NOT politicians:
## Government workers who are hired or appointed such as government employees and diplomats (e.g. Anne Cox Chambers, Joyce Anne Barr).
## Appointed members of cabinet, executive departments, government agencies and other civil servants who have not run for any electoral positions (e.g. Chris Lu, Kathleen Merrigan).
## Appointed (not elected) members of the judicial branch, law enforcement, and military (e.g. Chase T. Rogers, William J. Bratton).
## Members of royalty and nobility who do not hold any official political positions (e.g. Prince Charles, Sarah, Duchess of York).
## Activists, campaigners and lobbyists (e.g. Sandeep Pandey, Niillas Somby).
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Politician

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a politician to an act of cosponsoring a proposed legislation. To cosponsor a bill is to formally back the bill but not to introduce it for ratification by a legislative body. Note that the properties mso:event.action.agent and mso:event.action.object should be used to record, respectively, the politician who cosponsored the bill and the bill that was cosponsored.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Cosponsored Legislation

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that relates a politician to the districts that he or she has represented in his or her political career.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: District Represented

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:government.politician to the mso:government.election_campaign(s) the politician has run.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Election Campaigns

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a politician to the date that he or she first occupied an elected office.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: First Elected

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:government.politician to the mso:government.position_held relationship collecting the data on the politicians offices.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Positions Held

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:government.politician to the mso:government.legislative_committee_membership relationships collecting the data on the politician's roles in given legislative committees.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Legislative Committees

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links a politician to an official vote cast by the politician in a legislative house of government.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Legislative Vote

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that links a politician to the legislative votes on a piece of legislation which the politician voted on.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Legislative Votes Aggregated

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a politician to the total number of votes cast by the politician in a legislative house. Note that this number does not include abstentions.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Legislative Votes Cast

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a politician to the total number of votes missed by the politician in a legislative house. Note that this number does not include abstentions.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Legislative Votes Missed

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:government.politician to the politician's mso:government.political_party_tenure.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Party

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that relates a politician to the political parties with which he or she has been affiliated in his or her political career.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Political Party

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a politician to an act of sponsoring a proposed legislation. To sponsor a bill is to introduce it for ratification by a legislative body. Note that the properties mso:event.action.agent and mso:event.action.object should be used to record respectively, the politician who sponsored the bill and the bill that was sponsored.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Sponsored Legislation

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type containing standard respondent types, like 'adults' or 'registered voters'.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Poll Respondent Category

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.poll_respondent_category to the mso:government.election_poll(s) which used hte category for its respondents.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Polls

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Election polls conducted in this location.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Election polls
rdf:Description.mso:type.property.deprecation_info: If this property is needed, it should be added to location.location. DeprecatedBy:[REDMOND\ianiles]

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Polling results in favor of this entity.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Poll scores
rdf:Description.mso:type.property.deprecation_info: If this property is needed, it should be added to event.agent. DeprecatedBy:[REDMOND\ianiles]

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all agents responsible for polls done to solicit opinion.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Polling Authority

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.polling_authority to the mso:government.election_poll conducted.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Election Polls

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A place where voters in the given political district can cast their ballots in an election.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Polling Place

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Relationship collecting the data for a politician's tenure in a given political position. Note that this relationship type should be used only with governmental bodies, which have executive or legislative authority. In the case of appointments to government agencies, the property mso:organization.organization.leadership should be used.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Government Position Held

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a position held in the government to information about the appointment of the person who holds the position. Note that the property is multivalued, because a person may be appointed more than once to a continuously held position, e.g. when a position spans more than one presidency.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Appointment

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.position_held relationship to the mso:government.office_category, which is the basic title or role of the office, without the name of the jurisdiction or other qualification. E.g., "Prime Minister" rather than "Prime Minister of Canada", or "Senator" rather than "U. S. Senator".
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Basic Title

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.position_held relationship to the mso:government.political_district the political represented in the given office. This is not the same as the jurisdiction of the office held; do NOT, for example, enter the name of a city if the position is held by a mayor. See also mso:government.position_held.governmental_jurisdiction
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: District Represented

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property indicating the duration that the given person held the office or title.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Position Duration

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.position_held relationship to the date when the officeholder started.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: From

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.position_held relationship to the mso:government.governmental_body in which the politician holds a position.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Governmental Body

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Enter the area over which the office or position has jurisdiction; for national offices, this should be the country; for local offices, the city or municipality; etc.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Jurisdiction of office
rdf:Description.mso:type.property.deprecation_info: This property is relative to the office or title. Use government.office_or_title.jurisdiction instead. DeprecatedBy:[REDMOND\ianiles] Successor:[mso:government.office_or_title.jurisdiction]

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the status of the given politician with respect to the last election or future elections, e.g. incumbent, challenger or not seeking reelection.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Position Holder Status

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.position_held relationship to the mso:government.legislative_session(s) the politician participated in during their tenure in the position.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Legislative Sessions

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property relating an mso:government.position_held relationship to the mso:government.politician that held the given position.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Officeholder

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property relating an mso:government.position_held relationship to the mso:government.office_or_title the politician held. This should be the specific role, "Prime Minister of Canada" or "Mayor of Queensborough" rather than the general title category.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Office

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating the order of the position with respect to other positions of the same office or title.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Position Held Order

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property relating an mso:government.position_held relationship to the person or organization that appointed the given politician to the office.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Appointed by

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.position_held relationship to the politician who precedes the given office holder in this office.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Predecessor

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.position_held relationship to the politician who succeeds the office holder in the given office.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Successor

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.position_held to the date when the officeholder ceased holding this government position.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: To

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A federal agency that is charged with transporting letters and packages around the world.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Postal Service

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all primary elections and caucuses. Primaries and caucuses select a candidate for a political party before the general election. A primary involves casting secret ballots, while a caucus involves public voting and consensus-building.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Primary election

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A Boolean property that indicates that the election is a caucus. If the property is not set, it is assumed to be a primary.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Caucus

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.primary_election to the mso:government.election that follows. A primary usually determines a portion of the candidates that will participate in the follow-on election.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Follow on Election

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.primary_election to the mso:government.political_party whose candidates are running in the primary, and some set of which will be candidates in the follow-on election.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Party

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Type representing the collection of all public services. These are the services provided by a government to its citizens. Examples include education, emergency, library, and postal services.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Public Services

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type that serves to collect information about questions and the answers that are provided to them.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Question

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a question to the answers that were given.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Answer

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the content of the question that was asked.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Question

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Enumeration type that lists the classes of United States Senators. The set of senators is divided into three classes or 33 or 34 members each. These classes determine which Senate seats are up for election in a given year.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Senator Class

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Enumeration representing first class of United States senators.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Class 1

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Enumeration representing third class of United States senators.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Class Three

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Enumeration representing second class of United States senators.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Class 2

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: An agency of the federal government that administers social insurance programs, e.g. retirement, disability, and survivors' benefits. Includes the United States Social Security Administration (SSA).
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Social Security

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all state of emergency declarations. State of emergency declarations are those governmental declarations that announce the country is in a state of emergency. The government can suspend and/or change some functions of the executive, the legislative, and/or the judiciary during this period of time. It alerts citizens to change their normal behaviour and orders government agencies to implement emergency plans. A government can declare a state of emergency during a time of natural or man-made disaster, during a period of civil unrest, or following a declaration of war or situation of international/internal armed conflict.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: State of Emergency Declaration

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.state_of_emergency_declaration to any other mso:law.legislation that is an outcome of the given state of emergency.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Legislation

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A division of the federal government that is entrusted with collecting taxes, e.g. income taxes, from the citizens of the country.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Taxation Agency

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Meetings which are open to the public and feature a politician, either a candidate or an office holder, who listens to comments and responds to questions from the attendees.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Town Hall

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a town hall to the politician who is the featured speaker at the town hall.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Politician

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a town hall to a question that was asked and answered at the town hall.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Town Hall Question

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all former and current members of the U.S. Congress.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: U.S. Congressperson

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a United States congressperson with the identifier assigned to the congressperson by the Government Publishing Office.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Member ID

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.u_s_congressperson to their senator class, which determines when the senator will be up for re-election. Senators are divided into three classes, and elections for a class are held every two years on a rotating basis.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Class

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.u_s_congressperson to their THOMAS ID, which is the ID given by the LoC's THOMAS data source.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: THOMAS ID

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all former and current U.S. presidents.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: US President

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.us_president to the number of the presidency; presidents with non-sequential terms have two numbers.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: President Number

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.us_president to the people who have served as a vice president for their administrations.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Vice President

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all US Presidential campaigns. These are the election campaigns that result in the election of a US President.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: US Presidential Campaign

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.us_presidential_campaign to the running mate's mso:government.us_vice_presidential_campaign.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Running Mate

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The collection of all U.S. presidenital elections. These are the indirect elections held every four years to elect a President and Vice-President of the United States.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: U.S. Presidential Election

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.us_presidential_election to the number of available electoral votes during the election.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Available Electoral Votes

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.us_presidential_election_results to the number of electoral votes needed to win the election.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Needed Electoral Votes

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Value type collecting the data for United States Presidential elections. Data for these entities include the number of states the candidate carried and the number of electoral votes the candidate received.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: U.S. Presidential Election Results

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.us_presidential_election_results to the number of electoral votes the candidate received in the election.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Electoral Votes

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.us_presidential_election_results to the number of states the candidate carried in the election.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: States Carried

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all former and current U.S. vice-presidents.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: US Vice President

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:government.us_vice_president to the mso:government.us_president under which the former served.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: President

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:government.us_vice_president to number of this vice president's term.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Vice President Number

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all vice-presidential campaigns. These campaigns occur in conjunction with their respective Presidential campaigns.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: US Vice-Presidential Campaign

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:government.us_vice_presidential_campaign to its running mate's mso:government.us_presidential_campaign.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Running Mate

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: An enumeration of the votes that can be cast in a legislative context.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Vote

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: An enumeration value indicating that the voter is not present for the vote on the given legislation.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Absent

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: An enumeration value indicating that the voter is present but does not cast a vote for the given legislation.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Abstain

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: An enumeration value indicating that the voter votes for the given legislation.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Aye

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: An enumeration value indicating that the voter votes against the given legislation.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Nay
